interaction_summary:
=== Purchase Information === Product Title: Kea Health Manuka Honey Moisturizer Cream - For Cracked Hands and Feet - Eczema and Psoriasis Treatment - Anti Itch Relief for Dry Skin - With Lanolin and Olive Oil Review Date: 2021/09/28 Store: Kea Health Average Rating: 4.1 Product Details: {'Brand': 'Kea Health', 'Item Form': 'Cream', 'Unit Count': '7.0 Ounce', 'Number of Items': '1', 'Use for': 'Hands, Feet', 'Package Dimensions': '2.95 x 2.91 x 2.72 inches; 8.15 Ounces'} Review Text: I have super dry skin in general & go through creams & lotions Iike crazy, always looking for the perfect one.
This one? WOW - is it ever super moisturizing.

On my hands, I can rub it in for several minutes & it feels really creamy like a good massage cream. The lanolin must be what makes this happen & the olive oil must be the reason my skin is glistening afterwards. If I need to do something right away, I do wipe my palms off a bit but, at night I’ve been rubbing this in & leaving it to soak in all night.
On my feet, I rub this on my heels & balls of my feet after a late shower, then cover them with comfy socks & let this soak in all night.
Next morning? New hands, new feet! They feel great.

Manuka honey is known for its effectiveness in treating skin issues due to its antibacterial properties, so the combination of this, along with the other ingredients makes this an instant favorite in my book.
A little goes a long way & the price is very reasonable for the excellent quality.

**Thank you for reading my review & I hope that it’s Helpful!** Review Title: OUTSTANDING cream that glides on & leaves you glistening… my hands & feet LOVE it! Rating: 5.0 --------------------------------------------------
reference_summary:
N3 No Name Necessary Pore-Minimizing Mattifying Oil and Shine Control Anti-aging Makeup Face Primer Spray (200ml) No Name Necessary {'Brand': 'No Name Necessary', 'Skin Type': 'Combination', 'Package Information': 'Bottle', 'Finish Type': 'Matte', 'Specialty': 'Mattifying', 'Product Dimensions': '1.7 x 1.7 x 7.5 inches; 8.78 Ounces'} Coming from a total Makeup Klutz, this product is - fantastic??!
I don't always wear foundation or pressed powder or anything to cover everything, but I really should.
Had an event on Sat. that I stepped it up for & tried this... long story short, IT WORKS.
I washed & lotioned my face as usual, then waited an hour or so to let it totally absorb.
Sprayed this & let it dry.
Applied a cream foundation that I've used before but, this time, it seemed to spread more evenly & easily and it looked really smooth & nice!
Received husband compliments & girlfriends at event compliments!
Whatever the magic is in this spray bottle, I'll be sure to keep it on hand. Amazing stuff! Argan Magic Color Protection Hair Mask – Nourishes, Hydrates & Helps to Protect Color Treated Hair | Enriched with Moringa Oil & Botanical Extracts | Made in USA | Paraben Free | Cruelty Free (8 oz) Argan Magic {'Brand': 'Argan Magic', 'Item Form': 'Cream', 'Material Feature': 'Natural, Cruelty Free, Paraben Free', 'Hair Type': 'Color Treated', 'Product Benefits': 'Hydrating', 'Package Dimensions': '4.45 x 4.09 x 3.43 inches; 8 Ounces', 'UPC': '605923470710'} My daughter has long, thick hair that she colors a few shades darker than her own & is always looking for products to keep it healthy.
And this hair mask is a winner!
The fragrance is a vague salon-type scent that’s pleasant but not overpowering. The amount of hair she has takes a lot of this, but WOW - you can see the results - her hair is very shiny & soft. It doesn’t have that cheap conditioner greasy softness - it’s a nice, swingy softness. Moroccan argan oil is the secret!
At nearly $18 for 8 oz., it’s a pricey treat but also worth it.

Thank you for taking the time to read this & I hope it’s helpful! Help for color-treated hair? Yes & thank you! Burt's Bees Baby Bath Time Kit with Ultra Gentle Lotion, Bubble Bath, Foaming Shampoo & Wash, Nourishing Baby Oil, and Face & Hand Cloths Burt's Bees ['Babies deserve a fresh start in life with ingredients from nature that are gentle for their delicate skin. Experience our most popular natural Burts Bees Baby products together in one. Our gentle, effective and natural baby products cleanse, soften and help moisturize babys precious skin safely and naturally. Its easy to make bath time fun with the mild, tear-free bubble bath, then simply cleanse with the foaming 2-in-1 baby shampoo and body wash. Finish by moisturizing with ultra gentle lotion and nourishing baby oil to keep skin soft and fresh. A pack of face and hand cloths is handy for on-the-go cleansing. These baby care essentials are pediatrician tested, gentle enough to use every day and formulated without parabens, phthalates, SLS, petrolatum or synthetic fragrances, so you can feel good about caring for babys delicate skin. This new baby gift basket is a sweet gift for any baby shower occasion.'] {'Item Form': 'Lotion', 'Skin Type': 'All', 'Brand': "Burt's Bees", 'Scent': 'See Individual Packaging', 'Material Feature': 'Cruelty Free', 'Product Dimensions': '11.5 x 6.44 x 3.19 inches; 3.13 Pounds', 'Item model number': 'TU_33789', 'UPC': '792850911796', 'Manufacturer': 'AmazonUs/BURBP'} If you’re a Burt’s Bees fan, you’ll appreciate this boxed set.
It’s full of full-sized quality goodies packed perfectly in a sturdy box which makes it convenient to gift.
(ALSO: you don’t have to be a baby to use these! I have every intention of using them all on my almost 60 yr old self because I like their products for my very sensitive skin.)

At a little over $8/per piece, they’re priced at full retail, but you are paying for the convenience of boxed selections.

**Thank you for reading this review & I hope that it’s Helpful!** Very giftable with a nice selection of quality products! You pay for the boxed convenience… Eyebrow Tattoo Pen, Waterproof brow Pencil, Microblading Brow Pen, Natural Looking, Long Lasting (1# Light Brown) EINHOOM {'Brand': 'EINHOOM', 'Item Form': 'Pencil', 'Finish Type': 'Natural', 'Product Benefits': 'Smoothening', 'Skin Type': 'All', 'Package Dimensions': '4.8 x 0.79 x 0.75 inches; 0.32 Ounces'} Full disclosure: I’m a makeup klutz who has no business posting a pic of eyebrows BUT — for the 1st time, I found a product that let me actually draw some in!
My brows never fully grew back after chemo in 2005, so I’ve just learned to love my sparse & whispy nothings.
This pen, though, is pretty goof proof! I think it’s the way the end is shaped with 4 little tips similar to a fork… the lines that come out aren’t thick & bold, but they can be if you just keep drawing over & over.

My daughter is a brow fill-in champ, so I will definitely have her help me next time she’s home but, in the meantime, I will recommend this product since if I can use it, anyone can!
I’m timid about big dark brows, but will try a little more each day. At just under $10, it’s a great value for an excellent product.

**Thank you for reading this review & I hope that it’s Helpful!** Makeup klutz me can actually use this! Very easy to apply & draw… Back Acne Treatment Spray | Bacne Cure Treatment Spray | Clears Back Acne, Body Acne, Chest Acne, Butt Acne, Ingrown Hairs & Razor Bumps | Formulated with Natural Ingredients, Cruelty-free | 5.1 oz PROOT {'Item Form': 'mist', 'Brand': 'PROOT', 'Skin Type': 'Oily, Combination, Dry, Normal', 'Use for': 'Whole Body', 'Item Volume': '5.1 Fluid Ounces', 'Product Dimensions': '1.7 x 1.7 x 7 inches; 7.48 Ounces', 'Manufacturer': 'Choice Cosmetics Co.,Ltd'} I ordered this for my daughter who spends a lot of time in the gym, so fitted workout clothes + sweat + misc. dirt = back breakouts!
This spray not only feels good going on, but it has helped her flare ups considerably after using it for a week after each shower (2x/day).

The design allows it to spray out at all angles which is important to reach your back if there isn’t anyone to help you with it.
There’s no downside - it feels good, there’s no funky residue, it has reduced the redness & inflammation, & it’s easy to use.
Definitely recommend & will order again!

**Thank you for reading my review & I hope that it’s Helpful!** You can actually reach your back with this! 1 week use & it looks much improved… BeautyGARDE MAGIC Charcoal Facial Cleanser - detoxifying and anti-pollution face cleanser, Nonie Creme BeautyGARDE {'Is Discontinued By Manufacturer': 'No', 'Product Dimensions': '1.5 x 2.13 x 7.75 inches; 4.8 Ounces', 'Item model number': '1201', 'UPC': '856365007242'} The scrubber tip on this tube of cleanser sounded like a great idea, so I ordered it. I’ve used charcoal face products on my very dry, sensitive skin in the past with no irritation or reaction & this one is fine, too. Cleans, rinses well, moisturizes a bit.

BUT — the angled tip has teeny nylon bristles that are actually too short. You squeeze the tube to push some product onto the surface & gently “scrub” your face with it. The problem is that the bristles are so short that it just feels like a plastic disc massage! No matter how gently or firmly I applied it, the result was the same - rubbing creamy gray cleanser across my face with a circle of hard plastic.

In theory, this idea is good but the actual design of the tip does not work for me.

**Thank you for reading my review & I hope that it’s Helpful!** Scrubber feature is better in theory than in practice - NOPE! Cleanser is fine… Kea Health Manuka Honey Moisturizer Cream - For Cracked Hands and Feet - Eczema and Psoriasis Treatment - Anti Itch Relief for Dry Skin - With Lanolin and Olive Oil Kea Health {'Brand': 'Kea Health', 'Item Form': 'Cream', 'Unit Count': '7.0 Ounce', 'Number of Items': '1', 'Use for': 'Hands, Feet', 'Package Dimensions': '2.95 x 2.91 x 2.72 inches; 8.15 Ounces'} I have super dry skin in general & go through creams & lotions Iike crazy, always looking for the perfect one.
This one? WOW - is it ever super moisturizing.

On my hands, I can rub it in for several minutes & it feels really creamy like a good massage cream. The lanolin must be what makes this happen & the olive oil must be the reason my skin is glistening afterwards. If I need to do something right away, I do wipe my palms off a bit but, at night I’ve been rubbing this in & leaving it to soak in all night.
On my feet, I rub this on my heels & balls of my feet after a late shower, then cover them with comfy socks & let this soak in all night.
Next morning? New hands, new feet! They feel great.

Manuka honey is known for its effectiveness in treating skin issues due to its antibacterial properties, so the combination of this, along with the other ingredients makes this an instant favorite in my book.
A little goes a long way & the price is very reasonable for the excellent quality.

**Thank you for reading my review & I hope that it’s Helpful!** OUTSTANDING cream that glides on & leaves you glistening… my hands & feet LOVE it!
profile:
**User Summary:**

- **Makeup Enthusiasm**: User identifies as a makeup novice but is eager to experiment with products that enhance their appearance, especially for special occasions.

- **Preference for Mattifying Products**: Exhibits a strong preference for products that deliver a matte finish and control oil and shine.

- **Combination Skin**: User has a combination skin type, which influences their makeup product choices.

- **Skill Development**: Recently demonstrated increased confidence in using makeup tools by successfully applying an eyebrow product, indicating a willingness to learn and improve their makeup skills.

- **Influence of User Experience**: Prioritizes personal experiences and results over brand reputation, favoring products that visibly improve makeup application.

- **Social Validation**: Values compliments and feedback from others, which boosts their confidence in product effectiveness.

- **Hair and Body Care Interest**: Recently purchased hair care products for nourishment and hydration for color-treated hair and body care items aimed at treating back and body acne, reflecting a holistic commitment to maintaining healthy skin and hair.

- **Gentle Skin Care Appreciation**: Seeks gentle, natural skincare products suitable for sensitive skin, extending their beauty routine to include body and baby care essentials.

- **Practical Approach to Products**: The user evaluates effectiveness in skincare and shows discernment, as seen in their experiences with innovative features.

- **Focus on Dry Skin Solutions**: Recently demonstrated an interest in ultra-moisturizing products, particularly for treating extremely dry skin on hands and feet, highlighting a commitment to skin health and comfort. 

Overall, the user seeks effective, easy-to-use products across makeup, hair care, and body care that deliver noticeable results while enhancing their beauty skills alongside positive feedback from others.
